results.description: Uses SUGGESTION1 by using a momentum datafield, SUGGESTION4 by choosing a high-userCount momentum field (mdl77_opricemomentumfactor_actrtn24m). No vector fields so SUGGESTION2 not applied. Coverage is 0.9395 (>0.6) so ts_backfill not needed (SUGGESTION3 not applied). Kept implementation short and within operator/datafield limits (KEEP_IN_MINDs). Confidence set to 0.75 because long-horizon momentum is well-documented and this field has high usage.

Applies SUGGESTION1 using a 1-month active return field. Field mdl77_opricemomentumfactor_actrtn1m has full coverage so ts_backfill not needed. No vector ops (SUGGESTION2 N/A). Simple reverse operator to express mean-reversion. Confidence 0.6 due to higher noise in 1-month signals.

results.idea: Value*Momentum: high capex-to-price with recent momentum
results.description: Combines valuation (mdl77_deepvaluefactor_ttmcapexp, widely used) and momentum (mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_actrtn1m) per SUGGESTION1. Both fields have high coverage so no ts_backfill. Kept to 2 datafields and 1 operator multiply (KEEP_IN_MIND2). Confidence 0.68 reflecting diversification benefits.

Uses mdl77_earningmomentumfactor_numrevy1 (high userCount) per SUGGESTION4; single-field quantile for cross-sectional comparability. No vector ops. Coverage high so ts_backfill not used. Confidence 0.7 given strong historical link between analyst upward revisions and returns.

results.idea: Free-cash-flow growth vs industry FCF-to-price gap
results.description: Combines firm FCF growth (mdl77_historicalgrowthfactor_pctchgfcf) and industry-relative FCFP (mdl77_putput_indfcfp) per SUGGESTION1 to capture idiosyncratic improvement. Both have adequate coverage (>0.6) so no backfill. Two-field subtract keeps operators limited (KEEP_IN_MIND2). Confidence 0.66 given fundamental horizon.

results.idea: Earnings surprise momentum (change in EPS surprise * short momentum)
results.description: Multiplicative combination of earnings surprise change (mdl77_ooearningsmomemtummodel_chgsup) and short-term momentum (mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_actrtn1m) per SUGGESTION1. Both fields high coverage; no ts_backfill. Two-field multiply is within limits. Confidence 0.72 because earnings surprises often drive short term moves.

Adjust momentum by liquidity (mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_actrtn1m divided by mdl77_2liquidityriskfactor_milliq) per SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4 (choosing high-user liquidity field). Coverage is 1.0 for both, so no backfill. Keeps operators to one divide. Confidence 0.7 as liquidity-normalization often improves factor efficacy.

results.idea: Low residual variance momentum (momentum / residual variance)
results.description: Uses momentum (mdl177_pricemomentumfactor_tstalp_alt) and divides by residual variance (mdl77_2pricemomentumfactor_varresirtn) to favor predictable momentum. Both coverage ~0.98 so no ts_backfill. Two-field divide meets KEEP_IN_MIND limits. Confidence 0.66 due to improved risk-adjusted signal.

Uses earnings accruals change (mdl77_earningsqualityfactor_yoychgaa) and takes reverse to favor low accrual deterioration. Single-field reverse, no vector. Coverage high so no ts_backfill. Confidence 0.63 reflecting accounting signals' medium-term edge.

Uses unexpected accounts receivable change (mdl77_earningmomentumfactor_rau / mdl77_400_uar). Chose mdl77_400_rau (userCount 44) which has good coverage; use reverse to bet against large positive unexpected receivables. Single-field reverse to meet KEEP_IN_MINDs. Confidence 0.61 as accrual anomalies persist but are noisy.

Combines cash-to-enterprise-value (mdl77_deepvaluefactor_cashsev) with short momentum (mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_actrtn1m) per SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4. Both fields have high coverage; multiply used. Confidence 0.69 since cash-rich firms often outperform when combined with momentum.

results.idea: Net-cash momentum (net cash to equity * momentum)
results.description: Uses mdl77_liquidityriskfactor_netcashp and mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_actrtn1m (SUGGESTION1). Both fields wide coverage and user base; multiply keeps operators low. Confidence 0.68.

Contrarian on short-interest (mdl77_putput_siratio, mdl177_5shortsentimentfactor_days_to_cover). Use reverse on short-interest ratio to favor low short interest (SUGGESTION1). Both fields have mixed coverage but above 0.5; no ts_backfill applied. Confidence 0.58 because short-interest effects can be episodic.

results.idea: Analyst dispersion signal (low dispersion, high revs)
results.description: Subtract volatility of FY1 estimates (mdl77_earningmomentumfactor_stdevfy1epsp) from revision count (mdl77_earningmomentumfactor_numrevy1) to prefer many revisions with low dispersion. Two-field subtract follows SUGGESTION1 and uses high-user fields (SUGGESTION4). Coverage high so no backfill. Confidence 0.67.

Uses inverse PEG (inverse_peg_earnings_growth) and multiplies by short momentum (mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_actrtn1m). SUGGESTION1 applied; inverse PEG coverage moderate but acceptable; no ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.64 as PEG-based strategies can work in cross-section.

results.idea: Book leverage vs forward growth (growth surprise vs leverage)
results.description: Subtract forward ROE/2yr growth (mdl77_fc_y2repsg) from book leverage (mdl77_400_booklev) to penalize high-leverage low-growth firms. Both fields have good coverage/user presence. Two-field subtract applied per SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.6.

Multiply a forward FCF-to-price proxy (mdl77_2gdna_pfcf_cf) with earnings-quality composite (mdl77_ovalueanalystmodel_qva_composite); both have reasonable userCounts. SUGGESTION1 applied, limited operators, no backfill needed. Confidence 0.66.

Single-field industry-relative sales-to-price (mdl177_industryrrelativevaluefactor_curindsp__alt) quantiled cross-sectionally. SUGGESTION4 used (industry-rel fields widely used). Coverage 1.0 so ts_backfill not needed. Confidence 0.62 as industry relative valuations often mean-revert/outperform.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by skewness (avoid negatively skewed winners)
results.description: If skew90drtn (mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_skew90drtn) positive then use momentum (mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_actrtn1m) else reverse momentum: applies SUGGESTION1 with two fields. No vector ops; both have high coverage. KEEP_IN_MIND preserved (<7 ops, 2 fields). Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Cash burn signal (low burn with positive momentum)
results.description: Multiply low cash burn (reverse(mdl77_oput_put_cashburn)) with 3-month momentum (mdl77_opricemomentumfactor_indrelrtn5d_). Used SUGGESTION1 and prefer fields with decent userCount. Coverage OK so no backfill. Confidence 0.59 because cash-burn signals are more relevant for small caps.

Multiply ebitda-to-price (mdl77_deepvaluefactor_ebitdap) with short momentum (mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_actrtn1m). SUGGESTION1 & 4 applied; both fields have strong coverage/user counts. Confidence 0.7 due to robust combination of value and momentum.

Uses 4-quarter sales acceleration (mdl77_historicalgrowthfactor_salesaccel4q) and multiplies with 1-month momentum. Both fields have high userCounts; no ts_backfill. SUGGESTION1 satisfied, implementation concise. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Analyst revision momentum trimmed by dispersion
results.description: Quantile of (num revisions - dispersion) using mdl77_earningmomentumfactor_numrevy1 and mdl77_earningmomentumfactor_stdevfy1epsp. SUGGESTION1 & 4 used. Two-field subtract then quantile, within operator limit. Confidence 0.68.

Uses 5-year dividend growth metric (mdl177_2_historicalgrowthfactor_div5yg) with reverse (prefer stable growers). Coverage low (0.4894) so applied ts_backfill per SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(mdl177_2_historicalgrowthfactor_div5yg, 252). SUGGESTION2 not applicable. Confidence 0.45 due to poor coverage.

Uses industry-relative EPS-to-price (mdl77_put_put_indepsp) quantiled cross-sectionally. Coverage 0.5461 <0.6 so applied ts_backfill per SUGGESTION3 to improve coverage. Kept single datafield. Confidence 0.55 due to marginal coverage.
Uses Street Revision Confidence (mdl77_oput_put_strevconf) with momentum (mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_actrtn1m). Both fields moderate coverage; no backfill. Multiplied per SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Sales surprise momentum (sales surprise * short momentum)
results.description: Uses sales surprise (mdl77_2earningmomentumfactor400_salesurp) and short momentum field. Both have solid coverage and userCount; multiplied to capture fundamental surprise with price follow-through. Confidence 0.7.
Quantile of 1-yr change in operating cash flow per price (mdl177_historicalgrowthfactor_chgocfp) using SUGGESTION1. Coverage 1.0 so no backfill. Single-field quantile keeps it short. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by market illiquidity (momentum / nlvolcap)
results.description: Divide momentum (mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_actrtn1m) by nlvolcap (mdl177_fa_nlvolcap) to penalize illiquid momentum. mdl177_fa_nlvolcap coverage 1.0. SUGGESTION1 applied; kept to 2 fields. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Earnings surprise persistence (most recent surprise adjusted by std)
results.description: Uses most recent surprise adjusted (mdl77_2earningmomentumfactor400_fqsurstd) and applies quantile. High coverage and userCount per SUGGESTION4. No backfill needed. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Momentum times earnings growth (2-year projected EPS growth)
results.description: Multiply momentum (mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_actrtn1m) by 2-year projected EPS growth (mdl77_fc_y2repsg). SUGGESTION1 applied; both fields high coverage. Confidence 0.66.

Multiply visibility ratio (mdl77_2pricemomemtummodel_visiratio) with momentum (mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_actrtn1m) to favor moves on strong liquidity. Both have high coverage; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.64.
Quantile of industry-relative book-to-market (mdl77_industryrrelativevaluefactor_curindbp_) per SUGGESTION1 and high userCount. Coverage 0.9498 so no backfill. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: High analyst estimate revisions w/ low dispersion filter
results.description: Compute (mdl77_2momemtumanalystmodel_qma_estrev - mdl77_2earningmomentumfactor400_fqsurstd) and apply quantile. Both fields have strong user counts; SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.66.

Quantile of yearly change in gross profit margin (mdl177_fa_yoychggpm) to capture margin improvement. Coverage ~0.8632 and userCount low, no ts_backfill applied. Single-field quantile. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Surprise persistence vs momentum (chg in surprise * momentum)
results.description: Multiply change in surprise (mdl77_ooearningsmomemtummodel_chgsup) by short momentum. Both have high coverage; SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: Capex efficiency: capex to depreciation inverse
results.description: Reverse capex/dep rank (mdl77_ovalueanalystmodel_qva_capexdep) to favor firms that invest efficiently. Field has strong coverage and userCount; single-field reverse. Confidence 0.6.
Quantile of mdl77_deepvaluefactor_ttmsaleev (high coverage/user). SUGGESTION4 applied to prefer well-used field. Single-field quantile. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Operating cash flow to price growth signal
results.description: Quantile of TTM operating cash flow-to-price (mdl177_2_globaldevnorthamerica_v502_ttmocfp) after ts_backfill because coverage ~0.6104 (borderline) — applied ts_backfill(252). SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.56.
Quantile of mdl177_historicalgrowthfactor_pctchgfcf_alt (coverage 1.0). SUGGESTION1 used single datafield with good coverage. Confidence 0.65.
Multiply capex-to-assets (mdl177_2_managementqualityfactor_capexast) with 6-month momentum (mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_actrtn1m). Capex field coverage 1.0; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.

Multiply momentum (mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_actrtn1m) by inverse of residual variance (inverse of mdl77_2pricemomentumfactor_varresirtn implemented via divide with 1). Keep operators simple. Coverage high. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Analyst surprise momentum with visibility filter
results.description: Multiply most recent surprise (mdl77_ooearningsmomemtummodel_chgsup) by visibility ratio (mdl77_2pricemomemtummodel_visiratio). Both high coverage; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.68.
Quantile of industry relative 5-day return (mdl77_pricemomemtummodel_indrelrtn5d_) per SUGGESTION1. Coverage high and simple implementation. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Return-to-earnings revision synergy (act ret * rev change)
results.description: Multiply active return (mdl77_opricemomentumfactor_actrtn24m) and revision in FY2 EPS (mdl77_earningmomentumfactor_rev3y2). Both fields have good coverage; SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: TTM EBITDA to EV value momentum
results.description: Quantile of mdl77_fa_ebitdaev (TTM EBITDA-to-Enterprise Value) per SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4 with high user counts. Single-field quantile. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Net cash to equity contrarian (reverse netcashp)
results.description: Reverse net cash to equity (mdl177_fa_netcashp) to favor underappreciated net-cash firms. Coverage high; simple operator. Confidence 0.6.
Quantile of 3-yr growth in sales per share (mdl77_ohistoricalgrowthfactor_cg3ysales) — high userCount and coverage. Single-field quantile. Confidence 0.62.
Multiply momentum and analyst rating change rank (mdl177_momemtumanalystmodel_qma_ratingchg_alt). Chosen fields have high coverage; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.65.
Quantile of forward cash flow to price (forward_cash_flow_to_price) — full coverage and single-field. SUGGESTION4 used low but acceptable userCount. Confidence 0.63.

Multiply aggregate gamma (mdl77_2400_ga) with momentum (mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_actrtn1m) to capture option-driven moves. Both fields have good userCounts; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.57 due to episodic nature.

Quantile of revenue per employee (mdl77_2gdna_revper) with ts_backfill if coverage <0.6 (coverage 0.4456) — applied ts_backfill(252) per SUGGESTION3. Single-field quantile after backfill. Confidence 0.48.
Multiply decreasing net debt ratio (reverse(mdl77_2mqf_netdebt)) with momentum. Chosen fields have high coverage; SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: TTM operating income trend slope (growth momentum)
results.description: Quantile of slope of 3-yr TTM operating cash flow trend line (mdl177_2_historicalgrowthfactor_slope4qocf3y) — coverage ~0.8988. Single-field quantile. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: High earnings momentum adjusted by liquidity coeff
results.description: Divide earnings momentum composite (mdl77_fangma_emf25) by liquidity coefficient (mdl77_2_liquidityriskfactor_liqcoeff) to favor earnings momentum with stable liquidity. SUGGESTION1 used; both have strong coverage. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Short-term active return contrarian by industry
results.description: Reverse industry-adjusted 5-day return (mdl77_opricemomentumfactor_indrelrtn5d_) to capture short-term mean-reversion after industry outperformance. Coverage high; single reverse. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Price skewness contrarian (avoid high negative skew winners)
results.description: Reverse skew metric (mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_skew90drtn) to avoid negatively skewed instruments. Single-field reverse with high coverage. Confidence 0.55.

Multiply earnings quality rank (mdl77_ovalueanalystmodel_qva_earnquality) with value composite (mdl77_valueanalystmodel_qva_valuation). Both have strong coverage/userCounts; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.68.
Quantile of mdl77_2400_vefcomtt (TTM Operating Cash Flow-to-Enterprise Value), high userCount and coverage. SUGGESTION4 applied; simple implementation. Confidence 0.72.

results.idea: Inventory change anomaly (chg in inventory rank)
results.description: Quantile of change in inventory rank (mdl177_2_valueanalystmodel_qva_chginv) to detect inventory build-ups. Coverage 0.9248; SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.57.

Multiply change in asset turnover rank (mdl177_valueanalystmodel_qva_chgato_alt) with momentum to capture operational improvement followed by price action. Coverage 1.0; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.65.

Reverse days to cover (mdl177_5shortsentimentfactor_days_to_cover) to prefer stocks with high days-to-cover (less easy to squeeze) or use as contrarian depending on sign; single-field reverse used for simplicity. Coverage 1.0. Confidence 0.52.
Multiply TTM sales-to-price (mdl77_2deepvaluefactor_psmtt) with momentum (mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_actrtn1m). Both fields high coverage; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.67.
Reverse unexpected change in accrued liabilities (mdl77_2earningqualityfactor_lccau) to exploit accrual reversal. Coverage 0.6376 means acceptable; no ts_backfill applied. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Growth momentum composite (analyst growth model * price momentum)
results.description: Multiply growth analyst composite (mdl77_2growthanalystmodel_qga_composite) with price momentum (mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_actrtn1m). Both fields have solid coverage; SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.66.
Quantile of industry-relative trailing sales-to-enterprise (mdl77_2400_irttmsalesev) per SUGGESTION1; high userCount and alphaCount. Single-field quantile. Confidence 0.69.
Quantile of mdl77_deepvaluefactor_divyield to favor higher dividend yield cross-sectionally. Coverage 0.9498 with good userCount; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.6.

Multiply earnings momentum composite (mdl77_me_am_amv) with value analyst composite (mdl77_valueanalystmodel_qva_valuation) — both widely used (high userCount and alphaCount) per SUGGESTION4. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Short-term active return with industry normalization
results.description: Quantile of mdl177_pricemomemtummodel_indrelrtn5d_ (industry-relative 5d return) — single high-coverage field used. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.
Multiply rolling relative PEGY (mdl77_garpanalystmodel_qgp_relpegy) with momentum to favor cheap growth movers. Both fields have excellent user/alpha counts. SUGGESTION1 & 4 applied. Confidence 0.68.
Divide momentum by book leverage (mdl77_400_booklev) to favor momentum among less levered firms. Both fields cover well. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.

Multiply cash-to-price (mdl177_2_globaldevnorthamerica_v502_cashp) with short momentum. Coverage ~0.5536 (<0.6) so applied ts_backfill(252) per SUGGESTION3. Kept 2 fields. Confidence 0.5 due to coverage hit.
Quantile of mdl177_deepvaluefactor_ttmsp_alt (TTM Sales-to-Price) — field coverage 1.0. Single-field quantile for simplicity per KEEP_IN_MINDs. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Operating margin to sales linkage momentum
results.description: Multiply op margin-to-sales link (mdl77_2growthanalystmodel_qga_opmarginsales) with price momentum. Chosen because of high userCount; SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Unexpected change in accounts payable contrarian
results.description: Reverse unexpected accounts payable (mdl77_2earningsqualityfactor_pau) since positive unexpected increases may signal earnings manipulation. Field has high userCount; single-field reverse. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Price momentum normalized by 20-day vol-volume ratio
results.description: Divide momentum (mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_actrtn1m) by cvvolp20d (mdl77_2liquidityriskfactor_cvvolp20d) to prefer stable momentum signals. Both fields cover well. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Trailing 12-month FCF growth adjusted by assets
results.description: Quantile of mdl77_historicalgrowthfactor_fcfghc (1-yr change in assets-adj TTM FCF) — good coverage and userCount. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.
Multiply change in EPS surprise (mdl77_ooearningsmomemtummodel_chgsup) with visibility ratio (mdl77_2pricemomemtummodel_visiratio). Both fields high coverage; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: Operating cash flow to price times low accruals
results.description: Multiply operating cash flow to price (mdl177_historicalgrowthfactor_chgocfp) by reverse accruals (reverse(mdl77_earningmomentumfactor_fcfroey1p) used as proxy). Kept within two fields and limited operators. Confidence 0.6.
Quantile of earnings-price linkage rank (mdl177_momemtumanalystmodel_qma_eplinkage) to capture re-rating of earnings linkages. Coverage 1.0. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: 1-month active return trimmed by short-interest ratio
results.description: Divide 1m active return by short-interest ratio (mdl77_opricemomentumfactor_actrtn1m / mdl77_putput_siratio) to penalize crowded short positions. Both fields coverage acceptable; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: TTM capital expenditures yield * growth momentum
results.description: Multiply TTM capex-to-price (mdl77_deepvaluefactor_ttmcapexp) with medium-term momentum (mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_actrtn24m). Both fields have high coverage. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Net cash to equity contrarian with momentum filter
results.description: Multiply reverse net cash to equity (reverse(mdl77_fa_netcashp)) with momentum to favor underappreciated cash-rich stocks only if momentum exists. Two operations and two fields within limits. Confidence 0.59.

Quantile of (num revisions FY1 - FY2 dispersion) using mdl77_earningmomentumfactor_numrevy1 and mdl77_2earningmomentumfactor400_spe2yfvc. Both fields have good coverage; SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Trailing sales growth slope combined with momentum
results.description: Multiply slope of 3-yr sales trend (mdl77_historicalgrowthfactor_rsqr4qsales3y) with momentum. Field has high userCount; coverage good. Simple multiply. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: High active return with low regression error
results.description: Divide active return (mdl77_opricemomentumfactor_actrtn24m) by regression error of CAPM (mdl77_2gdna_rerror60m) after ts_backfill because coverage 0.3988 < 0.6 (SUGGESTION3). Confidence 0.45 due to backfilled low coverage field.

results.idea: TTM operating cash flow to EV with momentum
results.description: Multiply TTM OCF-to-EV (mdl77_2400_vefcomtt) by short momentum. Both fields strong coverage and usage. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.72.

results.idea: Inventory anomaly (chg inv rank * sales surprise)
results.description: Multiply change in inventory rank (mdl177_2_valueanalystmodel_qva_chginv) with sales surprise (mdl77_2earningmomentumfactor400_salesurp). Both fields have good coverage; SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.59.
Multiply leading cash flow yield (mdl77_2gdna_pfcf_cf) with reverse accrual indicator (reverse(mdl77_2earningsqualityfactor_rau)). Both fields have moderate coverage and user counts. Confidence 0.61.

Multiply street consensus rating (mdl77_earningmomentumfactor_stockrating) with momentum (mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_actrtn1m). Both fields have good coverage and userCounts. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.63.
Quantile of 26-week relative price strength (mdl177_pricemomentumfactor_rsi26w) — full coverage. Single-field quantile; SUGGESTION4 moderate. Confidence 0.6.

Multiply slope of 5-year EPS trend (five_year_eps_trend_slope_2) with value analyst composite (mdl77_valueanalystmodel_qva_valuation). five_year field coverage 1.0 and value composite has high userCount; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: TTM capex-to-price trimmed by growth duration
results.description: Divide capex-to-price (mdl77_deepvaluefactor_ttmcapexp) by growth duration (mdl77_liquidityriskfactor_growdura) to favor capex with sustainable growth. Both fields high coverage and users. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by analyst revision confidence
results.description: If revision confidence (mdl77_2earningmomentumfactor400_pelh) high then use momentum else null (trade_when). Coverage strong; used simple trade_when operator to limit positions. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.65.

Multiply earnings quality rank (mdl77_ovalueanalystmodel_qva_earnquality) by reverse book leverage (reverse(mdl77_400_booklev)) to favor high quality low-leverage firms. Two simple operations. Confidence 0.64.

Divide TTM sales-to-price (mdl77_2deepvaluefactor_psmtt) by 24-month residual variance (mdl77_2pricemomentumfactor_varresirtn) to favor stable value. Both fields have good coverage; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.61.
Multiply momentum by days to cover (mdl177_5shortsentimentfactor_days_to_cover) to prefer momentum with lower squeeze risk. Both fields have good coverage; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Operating income stability (CV of oper income) contrarian
results.description: Reverse coefficient of variation of oper income per share (mdl77_historicalgrowthfactor_cvopinc) to favor stable earnings. Field coverage ~0.8135; single reverse. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: TTM FCF yield * low analyst dispersion
results.description: Multiply leading FCF yield proxy (mdl177_fa_fc_egp) with reverse of FY2 dispersion (reverse(fy2_eps_estimate_dispersion)). Coverage: use fy2 field with coverage 1.0. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.
Multiply momentum by earnings expectation module score (earnings_expectation_module_score). Both fields full coverage; SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.63.
